text: Le Val-Larrey is a commune in the Côte-d'Or department in eastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Flée (the seat) and Bierre-lès-Semur.Arrêté préfectoral 21 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Côte-d'Or department ==References== Vallarrey Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Le Val-Larrey
